<S%G991>See<s%> that you <S%G3868>refuse<s%> not him that <S%G2980>speaks.<s%> For <S%G1487>if<s%> they <S%G5343>escaped<s%> not who <S%G3868>refused<s%> him that <S%G5537>spoke<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> shall not we <S%G5343>escape,<s%> if we <S%G654>turn<s%> <S%G654>away<s%> from him that speaks from <S%G3772>heaven:<s%>

And <S%G3588>this<s%> word, <S%G2089>Yet<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> more, <S%G1213>signifies<s%> the <S%G3331>removing<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> things that are <S%G4531>shaken,<s%> as of things that are <S%G4160>made,<s%> that <S%G3588>those<s%> things which <S%G3361>cannot<s%> be <S%G4531>shaken<s%> may <S%G3306>remain.<s%>
